tool_description: Tiled raster and vector maps with multiple visual styles. For web, mobile apps, GIS systems & more.
name: Raster and vector maps
title: Raster and vector maps

api_list.name: Map styles
api_list.description: Style definitions and corresponding resources, including layer definitions, fonts, sprites. It is recommended to use "style.json" resource to automatically confiugre OpenLayers, MapboxGL, Leaflet or other map renderers. ----------------------------[IMPORTANT]---------------------------- To authorize renderer requests to RapidAPI, you either need to inject "x-rapidapi-key" header into each request issued by renderer OR (easier) add it as the "rapidapi-key" query string parameter.

required_parameters.name: resource
required_parameters.description: Style resources, including style.json, tile.json, fonts, sprites and other meta-resources referenced by a map style.

required_parameters.name: style
required_parameters.description: Supported map style: osm-carto, osm-bright, klokantech-basic, positron, or dark-matter

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://raster-and-vector-maps.p.rapidapi.com/v1/styles/osm-carto/style.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "raster-and-vector-maps.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://raster-and-vector-maps.p.rapidapi.com/v1/styles/{style}/{resource}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "raster-and-vector-maps.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Tiles
api_list.description: Individual map tiles in raster or vector (MVT compatible) format.

required_parameters.name: style
required_parameters.description: Supported map style: osm-carto and vector

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://raster-and-vector-maps.p.rapidapi.com/v1/tile/osm-carto/0/0/0.png"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "raster-and-vector-maps.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://raster-and-vector-maps.p.rapidapi.com/v1/tile/{style}/{z}/{x}/{y_and_format}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "raster-and-vector-maps.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
